title: Ranged champion hatred.
body:
Can anyone please explain to me the hate boner everyone on here seems to have for any champion with more than 200 range? 

Are you all just riding the hashinshin train?

I get it, range is a advantage, but riot takes it into account when designing champion kits. And for proof of this, let’s look at garen. Imagine his kit, but on a ranged champion. So all of his abilities are at, we’ll say 550 range. That would be broken af. So riot doesn’t do that. 

So why the hell it is, that any ranged champion ever has to be sub 50% winrate or every loses their god damn minds?

Melee champions are given more power into all their abilities and their stats and growths, as well as given the best items in the game, at the cost of range.

replies.body:
None hates ranged champions because they are ranged.

The problem is when the ranged is paired with mobility that is way superior to the avg melee mobility. 

You won't see people complain about caitlyn or Jinx or Kog or Annie even though they have the best range in the game.

But you will see people complain about viktor because his shield spam coupled with the MS rendered a huge chunk of the traditional-toplane roaster useless. Also, during the Jhin-HoB-Stormrazor fiasco you saw every melee be frustrated and rightfully so, since a supposedly "immobile Carry" was able to outran an ulting Yi while autoattacking him at the same time, or even be able to outrun fizz's Q animation.

Dont forget champs that are ranged that will abuse the living ass out of Klepto atm (Karma and Kennen(and you already mentioned vik)).
As a melee, it literally sucks when you try to farm but the enemy just gets massive cashouts from just hitting you with autos. Had a game where I was Sion and I dicked the enemy Karma top and she went 0/2 (from what I remember), but ended up getting first item before I finished my first tank item because of the mass amount of Klepto procs I couldn't contest. Being a melee vs ranged sucks, but it sucks even more when something like Klepto can make that feeling get amped up to 11.
